publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Imprint is from colophon; the year is according to Lady Day dating.
With references to statutes; sheet 3 gives examples how to carry out the provisions of 39. Elizabeth, c.4.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
